text: Gigi Fernández and Natalia Zvereva were the defending champions and beat Inés Gorrochategui and Helena Suková, 6-7, 6-4, 6-3, in the final to retain the title. ==Seeds== Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated. The top four seeded teams received byes into the second round. ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * 1994 Volkswagen Cup Doubles Draw Doubles Doubles 1994
title: 1994 Volkswagen Cup – Doubles
